website_summaries.verdict: Whole-foods approach selenium, derived from a blend of vegetables and herb.
pros: Plant-based, vegan supplement not synthetically derived and bioavailable
Can be taken on an empty stomach
Brand loyalty is high and this supplement does not disappoint
cons: Higher price point and lower selenium content per pill than competing brands

customer_reviews.title: changed ingredients or sources for ingredients, not safe for me now
customer_reviews.text: a favorite company and source for vitamins, then all of a sudden the product seemed to have different sources for their ingredients and whenever I took it I broke out in weird rashes and I shared it with friends who has the same reaction so sadly I had to quit this company that I had loved before

customer_reviews.title: High quality product.
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality product. Selenium is one the most important minerals that us humans lack in our bodies. GMO foods lack a lot of minerals in general due to the genetic mutations, so we now have to seek alternatives to get the minerals in our bodies. This brand has the one the highest quality products out there, with bioavailability you could never find at walmart. Synthetic vitamins and minerals are being sold in almost all drug stores. Megafood's vitamins and minerals actually come from food, rather than synthetically made crap you would find in centrum or other walmart brands. Thanks Megafood for making us products that we are lacking very much today.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!!! I highly recommend it!! I love all of Mega Foods products!!!
customer_reviews.author: N Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product but does not meet 100% of daily selenium needed, especially for thyroid patients.
customer_reviews.text: Good product with many added benefits but for my as a Hashimotos dx. I needed a 100% daily requirement. My fault should have read bottle better.

product_meta.title: MegaFood, Selenium, Supports Optimal Health, Mineral Supplement Vegan, 60 Tablets (60 Servings (FFP)
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL MINERALS SUPPORT: Promotes optimal health with selenium delivered alongside a broad range of organic foods and botanicals
NOURISHING FOOD BLEND: Crafted with turmeric, ginger, spinach, broccoli and more; Functions as an antioxidant
TAKE ANY TIME OF DAY: Take 1 tablet daily any time of day, even on an empty stomach; Includes organic parsley, broccoli, rosemary, oregano, carrot and beetroot
OBSESSED WITH QUALITY: Non-GMO Project Verified, tested for 125+ herbicides and pesticides, free of gluten, dairy, soy; Certified B Corp; Certified Glyphosate Residue Free; Certified Kosher
MADE WITH REAL FOOD AND REAL PURPOSE: Premium supplements made with real food and added nutrients. We work with trusted farm partners who share our commitment to organic and regenerative agriculture
